channel.title: Geneva Global Governance Observatory
channel.description: Recent content on Geneva Global Governance Observatory

item.title: An overview of the GGO data
item.description: We have collected lots of data on about Global Governance from multiple sources! All of the data is publicly available in the form of R packages for various issue-domains of global Governance.

item.title: Have democracies become more free and accountable since the 1990s?
How Do Environmental Treaties Connect?
item.description: Want to try yourself? Please feel free to play with data on environmental treaties lineages! What about country memberships in environmental treaties, are you interested in that?

item.title: How to match agreements across different datasets?
What Does Global Health Governance Look Like?
